column4: i just hooked up a kvm switch and now the highest resolution i can get it 800*600 but the switch supports way higher than that, cna some1 help me out
You may need to manyally set the res in the xorg.conf. since X is not able to properly get the specs/info from the monitor with some kvm switches.
